tool_description: Get data on model train locomotives, wagons, and other related products.

api_list.name: Product Available
api_list.description: Check if a specific model train product is available.

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: An optional key to identify the product.

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: The model name of the product.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: The brand name of the product.

api_list.name: Get Product
api_list.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific model train product.

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: An optional key to identify the product.

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: The model name of the product.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency in which the product price is requested.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: The brand name of the product.
